Map115.Event[148].Page[0].list.message[0: There is a knight from the Kingdom of Rondon here...
Map115.Event[148].Page[0].list.message[2: She is scarred, dismembered and badly beaten.
Map115.Event[148].Page[0].list.message[3: Dead in other words. Seems like her ribs are crushed by
Map115.Event[148].Page[1].list.message[2: The stone is radiating faint blue light.
Map115.Event[148].Page[1].list.message[3: There is a dead knight here...
Map115.Event[148].Page[1].list.message[5: No reaction. She really is dead.
Map115.Event[148].Page[1].list.message[6: You undress the knight and take her \c[2]Plate mail\c[0]
Map115.Event[148].Page[1].list.message[7: She also has \c[2]2 Blue vials\c[0] with her.
Map115.Event[148].Page[2].list.message[2: The stone is radiating faint blue light.
Map115.Event[148].Page[2].list.message[3: There is a dead knight here...
Map115.Event[148].Page[2].list.message[5: No reaction. She really is dead.
Map115.Event[148].Page[2].list.message[6: She's got nothing left on her.
Map115.Event[149].Page[0].list.message[0: The eyes of the gaunt knight follow you intensively, but he
doesn't seem to react to you otherwise...
Map115.Event[149].Page[0].list.message[4: You get a feeling that the knight has lost his mind...
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[0: "I remember now... My name is Seril."
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[3: "I am getting my senses back now. I am sorry. About the way
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[4: "I am sorry. It's a great shame. How I attacked you like a
wild man. Just like one of the beasts that delve this
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[5: "My resolve was too weak... The madness engulfed me."
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[7: "I... I have a mission down here."
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[8: "But I fear I've delved too deep..."
Map115.Event[149].Page[3].list.message[9: "I'm sorry. I must collect my thoughts here for a
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[0: "I'm sorry. I must collect my thoughts here for a
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[1: "I met Jeanne, Buckman and Ser Seymor..."
"Can you tell more about your mission?"
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[3: "My brother. The captain of the dungeons of fear and hunger.
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[4: "We came here for him. He sent me an emergency message that
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[5: "I couldn't understand it completely. But from what I
gathered the dungeon order had crumbled."
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[6: "Death and corruption took over whatever order my brother
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[7: "It's no wonder. Just look at this place. With its root so
deep in evil. It was always just a matter of time."
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[9: "The madness I experienced must run in the family..."
Map115.Event[149].Page[4].list.message[1: "I saw a glimpse of him. What was left of him anyway."
"He had surrendered himself to the darkness completely. Now
he wanders the hallways purging them from anything still
"I'm sorry. I must collect my thoughts here for a
Map115.Event[149].Page[5].list.message[1: "They are still alive after all this time?"
Map115.Event[149].Page[5].list.message[3: "What is there for me if I tell you?"
Map115.Event[149].Page[5].list.message[4: "Of course. That is our meeting spot."
Map115.Event[149].Page[5].list.message[6: "You are a selfish one, aren't you?"
Map115.Event[149].Page[5].list.message[7: "I'm sure we can arrange a reward for helping me out."
Map115.Event[149].Page[5].list.message[8: "If you excuse me. I need to hurry there as fast as
Map115.Event[149].Page[7].list.message[2: The stone is radiating faint blue light now and
Map115.Event[149].Page[7].list.message[3: You could \c[2]Devour\c[0] the remains of the dead knight.
Map115.Event[149].Page[7].list.message[6: You could use \c[2]Demon seed\c[0] on the dead knight.
Map115.Event[149].Page[7].list.message[8: A baby sprouted out of your seed!
Map115.Event[149].Page[7].list.message[9: You take the baby with you.
Map115.Event[149].Page[7].list.message[1: You do not have enough sanity to perform this act.
No reaction. The armor hurts you leg.
You take all of the gaunt knight's gear including a \c[2]short sword\c[0],
a \c[2]long sword\c[0], a \c[2]Gaunt plate armor\c[0] and a \c[2]Gaunt bascinet\c[0].
There is no reason skinning the knight.
